        Specified by:

      • purchaseCoupon

        @Transactional
public void purchaseCoupon(long couponId,
                                           long userId)
                                    throws OutofStockException,
                                           UniqueValueException,
                                           InvalidDateException,
                                           ValueNotFoundException
        Purchases a coupon for logged customer. Customers can't purchase the same coupon twice, or if coupon is out of stock or expired.
        Specified by:
        purchaseCoupon in interface CustomerService
        Parameters:
        couponId - Id of coupon to be purchased
        userId - Id of user who is logged in
        Throws:
        UniqueValueException - When coupon was already purchased by same customer
        OutofStockException - When coupon is out of stock
        InvalidDateException - When end date of coupon has passed or is invalid
        ValueNotFoundException - When customer or coupon are not found
